verses.verse: And the famine <WH7458> was sore <WH3515> in the land <WH776>.

And it came to pass, when they had eaten up <WH3615> <WH8765> <WH398> <WH8800> the corn <WH7668> which they had brought out <WH935> <WH8689> of Egypt <WH4714>, their father <WH1> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Go again <WH7725> <WH8798>, buy <WH7666> <WH8798> us a little <WH4592> food <WH400>.

And Y'hudah <WH3063> spake <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, The man <WH376> did solemnly <WH5749> <WH8687> protest <WH5749> <WH8689> unto us, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Ye shall not see <WH7200> <WH8799> my face <WH6440>, except <WH1115> your brother <WH251> be with you.
If thou wilt <WH3426> send <WH7971> <WH8764> our brother <WH251> with us, we will go down <WH3381> <WH8799> and buy <WH7666> <WH8799> thee food <WH400>:

But if thou wilt not send <WH7971> <WH8764> him, we will not go down <WH3381> <WH8799>: for the man <WH376> said <WH559> <WH8804> unto us, Ye shall not see <WH7200> <WH8799> my face <WH6440>, except your brother <WH251> be with you.
And Yisra'EL <WH3478> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Wherefore dealt ye so ill <WH7489> <WH8689> with me, as to tell <WH5046> <WH8687> the man <WH376> whether ye had yet a brother <WH251> ?

And they said <WH559> <WH8799>, The man <WH376> asked <WH7592> <WH8804> us straitly <WH7592> <WH8800> of our state, and of our kindred <WH4138>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Is your father <WH1> yet alive <WH2416>? have ye <WH3426> another brother <WH251>? and we told <WH5046> <WH8686> him according <WH5921> to the tenor <WH6310> of these words <WH1697>: could we certainly <WH3045> <WH8800> know <WH3045> <WH8799> that he would say <WH559> <WH8799>, Bring <WH3381> your brother <WH251> down <WH3381> <WH8685> ?

And Y'hudah <WH3063> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Yisra'EL <WH3478> his father <WH1>, Send <WH7971> <WH8798> the lad <WH5288> with me, and we will arise <WH6965> <WH8799> and go <WH3212> <WH8799>; that we may live <WH2421> <WH8799>, and not die <WH4191> <WH8799>, both we, and thou, and also our little ones <WH2945>.

I will be surety <WH6148> <WH8799> for him; of my hand <WH3027> shalt thou require <WH1245> <WH8762> him: if <WH518> I bring <WH935> <WH8689> him not <WH518> unto thee, and set <WH3322> <WH8689> him before thee <WH6440>, then let me bear the blame <WH2398> <WH8804> for ever <WH3117>:
For except <WH3884> we had lingered <WH4102> <WH8701>, surely now we had returned <WH7725> <WH8804> this second time <WH6471>.

And their father <WH1> Yisra'EL <WH3478> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, If it must be so now <WH645>, do <WH6213> <WH8798> this; take <WH3947> <WH8798> of the best fruits <WH2173> in the land <WH776> in your vessels <WH3627>, and carry down <WH3381> <WH8685> the man <WH376> a present <WH4503>, a little <WH4592> balm <WH6875>, and a little <WH4592> honey <WH1706>, spices <WH5219>, and myrrh <WH3910>, nuts <WH992>, and almonds <WH8247>:

And take <WH3947> <WH8798> double <WH4932> money <WH3701> in your hand <WH3027>; and the money <WH3701> that was brought again <WH7725> <WH8716> in the mouth <WH6310> of your sacks <WH572>, carry it again <WH7725> <WH8686> in your hand <WH3027>; peradventure it was an oversight <WH4870>:
Take <WH3947> <WH8798> also your brother <WH251>, and arise <WH6965> <WH8798>, go again <WH7725> <WH8798> unto the man <WH376>:

And 'Elohim <WH410> Almighty <WH7706> give <WH5414> <WH8799> you mercy <WH7356> before <WH6440> the man <WH376>, that he may send away <WH7971> <WH8765> your other <WH312> brother <WH251>, and Binyamin <WH1144>. If <WH834> I be bereaved <WH7921> <WH8804> of my children, I am bereaved <WH7921> <WH8804>.

And the men <WH582> took <WH3947> <WH8799> that <WH2063> present <WH4503>, and they took <WH3947> <WH8804> double <WH4932> money <WH3701> in their hand <WH3027>, and Binyamin <WH1144>; and rose up <WH6965> <WH8799>, and went down <WH3381> <WH8799> to Egypt <WH4714>, and stood <WH5975> <WH8799> before <WH6440> Yosef <WH3130>.

And when Yosef <WH3130> saw <WH7200> <WH8799> Binyamin <WH1144> with <WH854> them, he said <WH559> <WH8799> to the ruler of his house <WH1004>, Bring <WH935> <WH8685> these men <WH582> home <WH1004>, and slay <WH2873> <WH8800> <WH2874>, and make ready <WH3559> <WH8685>; for these men <WH582> shall dine <WH398> <WH8799> with me at noon <WH6672>.
And the man <WH376> did <WH6213> <WH8799> as Yosef <WH3130> bade <WH559> <WH8804>; and the man <WH376> brought <WH935> <WH8686> the men <WH582> into Yosef's <WH3130> house <WH1004>.

And the men <WH582> were afraid <WH3372> <WH8799>, because they were brought <WH935> <WH8717> into Yosef's <WH3130> house <WH1004>; and they said <WH559> <WH8799>, Because <WH1697> of the money <WH3701> that was returned <WH7725> <WH8802> in our sacks <WH572> at the first time <WH8462> are we brought in <WH935> <WH8716>; that he may seek occasion <WH1556> <WH8705> against us, and fall <WH5307> <WH8692> upon us, and take <WH3947> <WH8800> us for bondmen <WH5650>, and our asses <WH2543>.
And they came near <WH5066> <WH8799> to the steward <WH376> of Yosef's <WH3130> house <WH1004>, and they communed <WH1696> <WH8762> with him at the door <WH6607> of the house <WH1004>,
And said <WH559> <WH8799>, O <WH994> sir <WH113>, we came indeed <WH3381> <WH8800> down <WH3381> <WH8804> at the first time <WH8462> to buy <WH7666> <WH8800> food <WH400>:

And it came to pass, when we came <WH935> <WH8804> to the inn <WH4411>, that we opened <WH6605> <WH8799> our sacks <WH572>, and, behold, every man's <WH376> money <WH3701> was in the mouth <WH6310> of his sack <WH572>, our money <WH3701> in full weight <WH4948>: and we have brought it again <WH7725> <WH8686> in our hand <WH3027>.

And other <WH312> money <WH3701> have we brought down <WH3381> <WH8689> in our hands <WH3027> to buy <WH7666> <WH8800> food <WH400>: we cannot tell <WH3045> <WH8804> who put <WH7760> <WH8804> our money <WH3701> in our sacks <WH572>.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Peace <WH7965> be to you, fear <WH3372> <WH8799> not: your 'Elohim <WH430>, and the 'Elohim <WH430> of your father <WH1>, hath given <WH5414> <WH8804> you treasure <WH4301> in your sacks <WH572>: I had <WH935> <WH8804> your money <WH3701>. And he brought <WH3318> <WH8686> SHim`on <WH8095> out unto them.

And the man <WH376> brought <WH935> <WH8686> the men <WH582> into Yosef's <WH3130> house <WH1004>, and gave <WH5414> <WH8799> them water <WH4325>, and they washed <WH7364> <WH8799> their feet <WH7272>; and he gave <WH5414> <WH8799> their asses <WH2543> provender <WH4554>.

And they made ready <WH3559> <WH8686> the present <WH4503> against <WH5704> Yosef <WH3130> came <WH935> <WH8800> at noon <WH6672>: for they heard <WH8085> <WH8804> that they should eat <WH398> <WH8799> bread <WH3899> there.

And when Yosef <WH3130> came <WH935> <WH8799> home <WH1004>, they brought <WH935> <WH8686> him the present <WH4503> which was in their hand <WH3027> into the house <WH1004>, and bowed <WH7812> <WH8691> themselves to him to the earth <WH776>.

And he asked <WH7592> <WH8799> them of their welfare <WH7965>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Is your father <WH1> well <WH7965>, the old man <WH2205> of whom ye spake <WH559> <WH8804>? Is he yet alive <WH2416> ?

And they answered <WH559> <WH8799>, Thy servant <WH5650> our father <WH1> is in good health <WH7965>, he is yet alive <WH2416>. And they bowed down their heads <WH6915> <WH8799>, and made obeisance <WH7812> <WH8691>.

And he lifted up <WH5375> <WH8799> his eyes <WH5869>, and saw <WH7200> <WH8799> his brother <WH251> Binyamin <WH1144>, his mother's <WH517> son <WH1121>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Is this your younger <WH6996> brother <WH251>, of whom ye spake <WH559> <WH8804> unto me? And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, 'Elohim <WH430> be gracious <WH2603> <WH8799> unto thee, my son <WH1121>.

And Yosef <WH3130> made haste <WH4116> <WH8762>; for his bowels <WH7356> did yearn <WH3648> <WH8738> upon his brother <WH251>: and he sought <WH1245> <WH8762> where to weep <WH1058> <WH8800>; and he entered <WH935> <WH8799> into his chamber <WH2315>, and wept <WH1058> <WH8799> there.
And he washed <WH7364> <WH8799> his face <WH6440>, and went out <WH3318> <WH8799>, and refrained <WH662> <WH8691> himself, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Set on <WH7760> <WH8798> bread <WH3899>.

And they set on <WH7760> <WH8799> for him by himself, and for them by themselves, and for the Egyptians <WH4713>, which did eat <WH398> <WH8802> with him, by themselves: because the Egyptians <WH4713> might <WH3201> <WH8799> not eat <WH398> <WH8800> bread <WH3899> with the Hebrews <WH5680>; for that is an abomination <WH8441> unto the Egyptians <WH4714>.

And they sat <WH3427> <WH8799> before him <WH6440>, the firstborn <WH1060> according to his birthright <WH1062>, and the youngest <WH6810> according to his youth <WH6812>: and the men <WH582> marvelled <WH8539> <WH8799> one <WH376> at another <WH7453>.

And he took <WH5375> <WH8799> and sent messes <WH4864> unto them from before him <WH6440>: but Binyamin's <WH1144> mess <WH4864> was five <WH2568> times <WH3027> so much as <WH7235> <WH8799> any of theirs. And they drank <WH8354> <WH8799>, and were merry <WH7937> <WH8799> with him.
